info.title: Web Engine Core SDK Package Tester Manager
info.description: Manages web core sdk packages tester mode.

method.name: activate
method.description: Activates the sdk tester mode for the given web core sdk package.

parameter.name: $packages
parameter.description: An array of all packages with the mixed package name or empty ("all") for all packages. It is "all" by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: deactivate
method.description: Dectivates the web core sdk tester mode.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: status
method.description: Gets the tester status for a given web core sdk package.

parameter.name: $package
parameter.description: The mixed package name to check.

method.returndescription: True if package is on tester mode, false otherwise.

method.name: libPackageStatus
method.description: Gets the tester status for a given web core sdk package.
method.returndescription: True if package is on tester mode, false otherwise.

method.name: getPackages
method.description: Get all web core sdk packages on tester mode.
method.returndescription: An array of all active mixed package names.
